CustomField.description: Identify the user that we should exclude from validation rules (e.g. Integration users) 08/2023 removed snnap integration profile reference
CustomField.formula:
or(
Profile.Name="Analytics Cloud Integration User", Profile.Name="AP Integration", Profile.Name="AusPost Integration", Profile.Name="AusPost Integration API Only", Profile.Name="Sales Insights Integration User", Profile.Name="SalesforceIQ Integration User", Profile.Name="SalesPreso Integration", Profile.Name="SSSW Social Integration", CONTAINS(Username, "schandel@exacttarget.com"))
CustomField.label: IsExcludedFromValidationRules
